message.content:
I need to identify the net cash flow from operating activities and its component sub-items from the provided statement.

Looking at the statement, I can clearly see the "Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities" line item with a value of "-5714107.45".

The component sub-items that make up this value are:
1. Net Profit: -1669849.77
2. Depreciation: 45742.50
3. (Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable: -2923459.19
4. (Increase) Decrease in Interest Receivable: -2566.71
5. (Increase) Decrease in Inventory: -3900000.00
6. Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable: 2390000.00
7. Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable: 346025.72

These 7 items add up to the total net cash flow from operating activities:
-1669849.77 + 45742.50 + (-2923459.19) + (-2566.71) + (-3900000.00) + 2390000.00 + 346025.72 = -5714107.45

This confirms that these are indeed the correct component sub-items.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-5714107.45', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value1': '-1669849.77', 'sub_item value2': '45742.50', 'sub_item value3': '-2923459.19', 'sub_item value4': '-2566.71', 'sub_item value5': '-3900000.00', 'sub_item value6': '2390000.00', 'sub_item value7': '346025.72'}}}
```
